description: A Qwik-based frontend route component implementing a notes application interface with CRUD operations, including sidebar, list, editor, and controls, interacting with NotesService for data operations.

classes.name: NotesState
classes.description: Interface representing the application state related to notes, including loading status, error message, list of notes, selected note ID, view mode, filter, and tags.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Interface representing a note object with id, title, content, tags, and updated timestamp.

methods.name: selectedNote
methods.description: Function that retrieves the currently selected note based on the state.
